sentences.en: A bag of fig rolls lay snugly in Armstrong's satchel.
sentences.cn: 阿姆斯特朗的书包里悄悄地摆着一袋无花果夹心面包卷.

sentences.en: An acceptable thimble is metal and fits snugly on the middle finger of the needle - holding hand.
sentences.cn: 好的顶针是金属制成的,并能舒适地戴在拿针的手的中指上.

sentences.en: And they were all nestled snugly beneath the breathtakingly flounced skirt of Big Red.
sentences.cn: 它们都安稳地陈列在那件令人惊艳的大红色荷叶边裙的下面.

sentences.en: He fitted the map snugly into the bag.
sentences.cn: 他把地图整齐地塞进包里.

sentences.en: Insert earbud and rotate it up until is fits snugly.
sentences.cn: 将耳塞插入耳内转动直到舒适地贴近耳内.

sentences.en: Jamie snugly wrapped in a white woolen scarf.
sentences.cn: 杰米围着一条白色“羊毛”围巾舒适而暖和.

sentences.en: Jamie was snugly wrapped in a white woolen scarf.
sentences.cn: 杰米围着一条白色羊毛围巾舒适而暖和.

sentences.en: Phileas Fogg, snugly ensconced in his corner, did not open his lips.
sentences.cn: 福克先生不声不响地坐在他的座位上.

sentences.en: Plane one side of the panel down until it fits snugly into place.
sentences.cn: 把板条的一侧刨一刨,使它放在这儿刚好合适.

sentences.en: She looked at Miss Melville, snugly ensconced among her new friends.
sentences.cn: 她看了看梅尔维尔小姐，她正舒适地安坐在新朋友中间。

sentences.en: The ear when drawn snugly the jaw end approximately 2 inches from theof the nose.
sentences.cn: 如果将耳朵沿着颌部向前拉伸,距离鼻尖约2英寸.

sentences.en: The farmyard was snugly sheltered with buildings on three sides.
sentences.cn: 这个农家院三面都有楼房,遮得很严实.

sentences.en: They were curled up snugly in bed.
sentences.cn: 他们舒适地在床上蜷着.

words.tran_cn: 舒适的；温暖的；紧身的；隐藏的
温暖舒适的地方，舒适的家
舒适地；隐蔽地；贴身地；紧密地

trans.tran_cn: 紧贴地，贴身地，暖和舒适地，安适地
